chapter.title: Before you begin
chapter.para: Before you start installing the Globus Toolkit version, there are a few things you should consider. The toolkit contains many subcomponents, and you may only be interested in some of them.

important.simpara: These all run on Unix platforms only.

chapter.para: Therefore, if you are new to the toolkit and want to experiment with the components, you may want to use a Unix system.
